Wondrous item, rare
Lighting one of these translucent, milky‚Äêwhite candles lets off an immensely foul smell, the flame bending toward the nearest lone traveler while the caustic black smoke drifts off in the direction of the nearest evil-aligned creature. After one of these candles is snuffed out after being lit for at least 10 minutes or burns through, it will begin to snow in the area for at least an hour, regardless of the current climate or the time of year.
